info.title: Operate a collapsed disclosure button in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstDisclosure
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first disclosure button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the first disclosure button
testPageDocument.querySelector('button[aria-controls="faq1_desc"]').focus();

user: With focus on the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions, set the state of the button to expanded.
instructions.raw: With focus on the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions, set the state of the button to expanded.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Change in state (to expanded) is conveyed
